name: things-that-are-legally-binding-or-not-within-the-uk
title: Things that are legally binding or not within the UK
description:
Discovery work for a potential list of things that are legally binding or not within the UK. New entries are being discovered through the ongoing debate concerning the European Union referendum (aka Brexit) within the UK.

IANAL. Please make suggestions for new or improved data using standard Github features. Pull requests are welcome.

Warning: this dataset includes Friday whimsy.
